"Compatriots, as I promised, today July 28, I present the economic situation of the country", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"We all know that the economic situation has been extremely difficult since 2015", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"By not having sufficient liquid resources, we resorted to external and internal financing", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
When entering into a complex economic situation, the decisions that were made were not properly measured ..., @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
"... and the limit was reached, the sustainability of our economy", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"Today we find a country with greater equity, better infrastructure, services and growing human talent", @Lenin Mo ... https://t.co/vUTiRE1aCB
"But, we have to pay for it. Everyone, with co-responsibility, because Ecuador is everyone's home ", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"We have to look ahead, and overcome the economic crisis in which we find ourselves", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"We must assume responsibilities all together: citizens, businessmen and Government", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"We are going to support dollarization, generate work and decent employment ...", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReportEC https://t.co/cRhNHrmMIE
"... eradicate extreme poverty, reduce inequality, generate equity and social justice ...", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"... and promote economic and social development", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"We must all do our part", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"There is nothing more revolutionary than truth and transparency with our people", @Lenin Moreno ... https://t.co/gk5rcG4P4F
Since we took office, I asked the economic team for an in-depth diagnosis of the economic situation, #Economic Report
"This diagnosis is complete", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"I have warned the economic team that, according to the Law, all data are true, accurate, public access", # EconomicReport EC
"I have instructed that the information be available on the official websites of the institutions responsible", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

"To plan our Economic Policy, we have identified two moments:", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"The 1st we do today: we present a diagnosis of the economic situation, how we have received the country", @ Lenin ... https://t.co/WVG6rLm6Zj
"... and the Proforma of the General Budget of the State, for 2017", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"The second moment will be in September, when we will present the budget pro forma for 2018", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"... and we will announce the economic program for the next 4 years", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"We have important financing needs", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"It requires about USD 8,000 million each year to cover the fiscal deficit", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"... and pay the amortizations of internal and external debt", @Lenin Moreno # InformeEconómicoEC
"In addition, we must guarantee an additional USD 2,000 million per year to meet national goals and objectives - 202 ... https://t.co/7lDkllGvcA
"For 2 years, the country has been facing difficult conditions due to:", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"Reduction in the price of oil, low prices of raw materials, appreciation of the dollar ...", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"... not to mention the devastating effects of the 2016 earthquake", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"And we continue in this adverse situation", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"In May of this year, the country's historical public debt, which includes local governments," @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"... reached an aggregate amount of USD 41,893 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"There are other liabilities of the State, such as short-term operations, liabilities of oil companies ...", @Lenin Moreno # InformeEconómicoEC
"... anticipated sales of hydrocarbons that, among others, add an approximate USD $ 8,000 million additional", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
We also register contingents that today are not debt, but that could be transformed into payment obligations, @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
"... totaling USD 4.367 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
It also includes a request from the State Comptroller for registration of obligations with @ IESSec, for USD 2,528 million # EconomicReport EC
To this we must add payment obligations in retirement incentives, which amount to around USD 1,000 million # EconomicReport EC

"Have confidence: we are going to guarantee the rights of affiliates and retirees", @Lenin Moreno # InformeEconómicoEC https://t.co/NonzkWhSgY
"The situation is critical. We need to improve financing conditions, generate more income ", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
"... increase our exports, the income of dollars to the economy, and encourage private investment", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
"I have arranged that - immediately - the following actions be carried out:", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
1. To stimulate the construction sector with a project of promotion and facilitation ..., @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"... and the revision of the" Capital Gains Law, without giving up the fight against land speculation ", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
2. Encourage investment and foreign exchange income, with a bill that allows the repatriation of capitals # EconomicReport EC
3. Promote the use of digital means of payment - electronic money - in coordination with the financial system, @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
4. From the 1st. government day we established austere measures of public expenditure, optimization of State resources # EconomicReport EC
"... mainly in hiring personnel, consultancies, advertising, vehicles, travel, among others", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
5. We will prioritize public investment towards what is strictly necessary, @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"... for the fulfillment of the national development goals and objectives", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"In September I will announce the complete economic program that will govern us the next years, fulfilling the Law deadlines", # ECeconomic Report
"... but I will not be able to do it alone", @Lenin Moreno # InformeEconómicoEC
"Today I present to the country the Budget Proforma 2017 that I will send to @AsambleaEcuador for approval", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"Up to May 30, 33.2% had been executed and 36.2% committed", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
This proforma amounts to USD 36,818 million, representing 2% growth over the codified budget of the previous year # EconomicReport EC
"This corresponds to what is indispensable for the operation of public services", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"The assumptions of the proforma establish that Ecuadorian oil is budgeted at USD 41.69 per barrel", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
"Exports are estimated at 136.6 million barrels", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"The import of derivatives is estimated at approximately 45.2 million barrels", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"The growth projection of the Gross Domestic Product is positive, at 0.7%", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
Most relevant income for 2017: | # EconomicReport EC
"For taxes, it is expected to raise USD 14,760 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"For taxes and contributions: USD 1,609 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"For transfers from public companies and the @BancoCentral_Ec: USD 3,322 million," @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"For transfers and donations of capital and investments: USD 3,241 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"For public financing: USD 11,670 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
The spending priorities are: | # EconomicReport EC
"Education with USD 5.198 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"Health with USD 2.779 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"Housing with USD 1,157 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"Social Welfare with USD 1,048 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"Security, Risks and Defense with USD 3,453 million", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"The fiscal deficit is projected at USD 4,700 million, reducing by one billion compared to the previous year", @Lenin # EconomicReport EC
"This will be achieved by optimizing public investment, and by a set of fiscal austerity measures," #EconomicReport EC
"Our goal is that by 2021, the non-financial public deficit will decrease from 7.6% of 2016 GDP to less than 2%" #Economic Report

"... and ensures that permanent spending is covered only with permanent income", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

"In September, with the proforma of 2018, we will present the economic program for the next four years", @Lenin # InformeEconómicoEC
Our economic program will promote the work, production, and well-being of all Ecuadorians, @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"... especially from those who need it the most", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC

"With serenity and optimism, we will achieve that this adversity drives us more", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
"A big hug compatriots", @Lenin Moreno # EconomicReport EC
